component.name: insertDimension
component.description: Insert an empty row or column.

component.name: deleteDimension
component.description: Remove rows, columns or parts of them.

component.name: appendDimension
component.description: Append empty rows or columns at the end of the sheet.

component.name: resizeDimension
component.description: Automatically resize dimensions based on content.

component.name: moveDimension
component.description: Move rows or columns to a new position.

component.name: updateDimensionProperties
component.description: Update properties like width/height of rows/columns.
